valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Hebrides 1000 expected 150 miles east of Iceland 1007 by midday tomorrow. Low south FitzRoy 993 expected Spain 1009 by same time. High southeast Norway 1025 moving slowly away east

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southeasterly, veering southerly later, 5 to 7. In east, southeasterly 6 to gale 8.
Sea state
In west, rough occasionally very rough. in east, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough in east.
Weather
In west, showers. In east, showers.
Visibility
In west, good occasionally poor. In east, good occasionally moderate.

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, cyclonic, becoming northerly, 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first. In north, northerly or northwesterly 3 to 5.
Sea state
In south, very rough, occasionally high at first, becoming rough, occasionally moderate later. in north, moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, thundery rain then showers. In north, showers.
Visibility
In south, poor becoming good. In north, good.
